1.「もう 会ってると思うけど 紹介するよ。| ダルル盗賊団の新入り ピンチョだよ！: I'm sure you've met him by now, but allow me|to introduce you. Pincho, the newest member of|the Darul Thieves!

2.「あ…あの時は どうも……。| 僕 ピンチョって いいます。: Oh...thanks for that time...my name is Pincho.

3.「キ キミは 怪盗ポイックリンを どう思う？| 彼女のような存在こそ 今の世界に: Ki, what do you think of Phantom Thief|Poiclin? Don't you think she's the kind of|hero the world needs right now?<yesno><close>

4.「アッ そうか！ ヒーローじゃなくて| ヒロインだって 言いたいんだね！| でも: Oh, yeah! You're trying to tell me that she's|a heroine, not a hero! But to me, she's a|hero!

5.「そうだよね！ キミはいい人だね！| お 同じ気持ちを持つ 仲間に出会えて| 本: You're right! You're a good man! I'm so glad|you found a like-minded companion!

6.「漆黒のスーツの マントをひるがえし| 夜の町を駆け抜ける 正義の怪盗……。|:
A thief with a jet-black suit, fluttering his|cape and running through the city at night, a|thief of justice... I longed to look like|
|that, so I tried to imitate him!

7.「コイツの着てる衣装 型紙から| 自分で作ったんだってよ。小道具も全部。| ほん: He made the costume he's wearing by himself,|from the paper pattern. All the props too. He|really is hard-core...

8.「ま ちょいと 変わったヤツだけど| 正義を愛する心意気は 人一倍だからね。|: Well, he's a bit of an oddball, but he loves|justice more than anyone else. That's why I|bought him!

9.「だ だけど……最近 ポイックリンが| 悪質な方法で 荒稼ぎしてるって| 言われ: But...lately there have been reports that|Poiclin has been making a lot of money through|nefarious means.

10.「僕 絶対に そんなハズないって| 思ったんだ！ だから 直接会って| 事情を聞: I thought to myself, "That can't be true! So I|went to see him and asked him what happened...

11.「そこで アンタに はち合わせたんだとさ。| まったく 人騒がせな ヤツだよ。: That's where he ran into you. He's a real|scandalous fellow, isn't he?

12.「とりあえず 極悪非道の冷血怪盗と呼ばれている| ポイックリンが ニセモノだと判:
At any rate, I'm glad that Phantom Thief|Poiclin, as the diabolical cold-blooded thief|is called, turned out to be a phony. I'll let|
|my companions know.

13.「協力してくれて ありがとう。| さあ 今回の報酬を受け取っておくれ！|: Thanks for your help. Now go on and receive|your reward this time!

14.「だ…ダークポイックリンは| これは ふ…復讐だって 言ってた……。: Dark Poiclin said this was revenge.

15.「だ…だから アイツは まだ何か| 悪事を 働こうとしているのかもしれない。|: So...maybe he's still trying to do something|evil. Well...we have to catch him quickly|before that happens!

16.「ぼ…僕は アイツの 手がかりがないか| 調べておくよ。何かわかったら| 連絡す: I'll keep checking to see if there are any|clues about him. I'll let you know if I find|anything.

17.「フン。ずいぶん あっけなく 捕まったものネ。| さぁ 人様のモノを盗む その浅: Hmm. You were caught so easily. Now, let's see|how shallow you are to steal someone's things.

18.「ハァ！？ オメー 誰だよ！| もしかして ニセモノかッ！？| いくらなんでも: Huh? Who are you? Could it be a fake? The|quality is so low!

19.「びょぇえええええええ！！| ごめんなさい ゴメンナサイぃいいい！| い い 命: Beeeeeeee!! I'm sorry, I'm so sorry!! No, no,|Just save my life, please!!

20.「チッ……わざわざ アシ運んで ソンしたわ。| コイツを 王立騎士団のヤツらに: Damn...I'm sorry I went to all the trouble to|carry that reed. Let's turn him in to the|Royal Knights and get the hell out of here...

22.「天知る！ 地知る！ 人ぞ知る！: Know the sky! The earth knows! Man knows!

24.「それでは皆さん……ごきげんよう。: Well then, everyone...have a nice day.

26.「フーン。コッチは よくできてんじゃない。: Hmm. This one is well done.

27.「なっ……なんですの アナタ！？| どうやって ここに……。: What are you doing? How did you get in here?

28.「アンタさぁ……いったい 誰の許可取って| こんな 茶番やってるワケ？: You... who gave you the permission to do this|farce?

30.「天知る 地知る 人ぞ知る…………: Heaven knows, earth knows, man knows...

31.「真の美少女怪盗ポイックリン！| 華麗に 参上でございますわっ！: The true beauty, Phantom Thief Poiclin! Here|she comes in all her splendor!

32.「さぁ ニセモノ！| いさぎよく 正体を現しなさい！: Come on, phony! Reveal yourself with dignity!

33.「ポ ポ ポイックリン様だぁ～～～～！！| 超カッコいい～～～～ッ！！: It's Mr. Popo Poiclin!!! ～～～～!!! Super cool|～～～～!

34.「我が名は ダークポイックリン……。| キサマを 奈落の底へ 突き落とす者。: My name is Dark Poiclin....the one who will|plunge Kisama into the abyss.

37.「……次は 逃がさないわ。: I won't let you get away next time.

38.「それでは皆さん ごきげんよう。| チリも残さず| キレイに退散ですわっ！: Well then, have a good day, everyone. We're|leaving here without a speck of Chiri!

39.どうやら 悪質な手口で 荒稼ぎしていたのは|ポイックリンの ニセモノだったようだ:
It seems that it was an imposter of Poiclin|who was raking in the cash through malicious|means. Let's report this to Darul at the|
|tavern in Mount Gatara.
